info.description: ThinkInk backend API with Stripe Checkout integration
info.title: ThinkInk API

get.description: Check if the current token is valid and not blacklisted

post.description: Send a password reset link to the user's email
Logs out a user and invalidates the session token
Updates the matching scale for a report that belongs to the authenticated user
Creates a Stripe checkout session for one-time payments
post.summary: Create a one-time payment checkout session

post.description: Creates a Stripe checkout session for subscription payments

get.description: Returns details about the user's current subscription

post.description: Cancels the user's subscription at the end of the current billing period
Generate a new JWT token using a valid existing token

get.description: Retrieves all reports belonging to the authenticated user
Retrieves all reports belonging to the authenticated user, sorted by matching scale
get.summary: Get user reports sorted by matching scale

200.description: List of user reports sorted by matching scale

post.description: Reset the user's password using a valid reset token
Authenticate a user with email and password
Register a new user with the provided information
Handles Stripe webhook events for subscription updates, payments, etc.
Uploads a signal file and stores metadata in the database with matching scale

400.description: Bad Request - No file uploaded, file too large, or invalid matching scale

get.description: Get user details by ID (must be authenticated)

403.description: Forbidden - Trying to access other user's profile

put.description: Update user details (must be authenticated and own profile)

403.description: Forbidden - Trying to update other user's profile

post.description: Validates a JWT token and checks user subscription for ML services

message.example: Subscription will be canceled at the end of the current billing period
Password reset instructions sent to your email

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and the JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
